ygData.subject: Taking the Befallen plunge
ygData.msgSnippet: Congratulations to you! I hope to get one of my very own someday, at this point that day seems very far away indeed. My 18th level clerical friend and I tried
ygData.messageBody:
Congratulations to you! I hope to get one of my very own someday, at this
point that day seems very far away indeed. My 18th level clerical friend and
I tried time and again to storm the depths of Befallen, but the residents of
that hole managed to defeat us time and again. Instead of taking a few steps
towards the higher levels, those deaths cost me a few steps back. A quick
scan of your message reveals what may be a flaw in my strategy - we need a
few more in our party to make Befallen ours. What do most Paladin's Befallen
romps consist of in party members?

I generally try to play paired up with another player, that way we can take
on things that /con up to equal to me. Unfortunately that causes trouble
when more than one creature attacks, even if those creatures are conning
blue. In one battle down there my clerical friend (lvl 18) and I (lvl 17)
took out (all blue) 2 greater skeletons, 2 necromancer acolytes, both pets,
1 ghoul, 1 wisp, and 1 lesser mummy, at the end of which we were both below
30% health and no mana. Quite the battle royale, and we were both amazed we
had survived!

Again, congratulations on your new Ghoulbane sword!
Kaladin, who weilds a mighty hammer of wrath for now :)


"Alexander G." wrote:

> From: "Alexander G." <smerte@...>
>
> I am happye to anounce that I aquired me a Ghoulbane yesterday on the
> Solusek Ro server. I have been camping it from time to time since lvl.
> 30 with little luck. Got a couple of silverplated bracers that I have
> distributed to the ppl. helping me.
> Yesterday our party consisted of: me 35pal, 35 ranger, 28 wiz, 27
> shaman.
> I have some 1hs to work on now since I have been using a bibs since
> lvl 24. <G>
>
> >From what I have heard the effect wont work until lvl. 30.
>
> -
> Cenaleb Crystalwind
> 35 pal on Solusek Ro
>
>
--
